mapper.select: select su.gender as gender,count(su.gender) as count from shanduo_user su join activity_score ae on ae.user_id = su.id and ae.activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and su.del_flag = '0' and ae.del_flag = '0' group by su.gender
